hero.title: Puratifomu Yebhizinesi Repasi Rese
hero.subtitle: Mahara nekusingaperi kumasevhisi ekutanga
hero.description: Dott inobatsira varidzi vebhizinesi sewe kugadzira mainvoisi, kugamuchira mari pamhepo, kutungamira accounting nezvivakwa, pamwe nekuskena bhakodhi—zvese papuratifomu imwe chete.

pricing.heading: Sarudza Chirongwa Chakakodzera Bhizinesi Rako
pricing.subheading: Hapana mitengo yakavanzika. Hapana kadhi rechikwereti rinodiwa kune Basic plan. Misa chero riini.

professional.name: Professional
professional.description: Kune mabhizinesi ari kukura anoda zvakawanda

features.heading: Zvese Zvaunoda Kukura Pasi Rose
features.subheading: Zvishandiso zvine simba zvakagadzirirwa mabhizinesi emazuva ano anoshanda kupfuura miganhu

operations.title: Kutonga Mabasa
operations.description: Rerutsa mabasa ako ezuva nezuva ebhizinesi

faq.heading: Mibvunzo Inowanzo bvunzwa
faq.subheading: Wana mhinduro kumibvunzo yakajairika nezve puratifomu yedu nemasevhisi.

feature.inventory.description: Kutevera stock munguva chaiyo nekuscan barcode uye kutsigira nzvimbo dzakawanda
feature.barcode.description: Gadzira uye scan mabharcode ezvigadzirwa nemagwaro
feature.pos.description: POS system yemazuva ano ine kugona kusiri pamhepo
feature.invoicing.description: Mabhiri ehunyanzvi mumari dzinodarika makumi mashanu nekushandura otomatiki
feature.tax.description: Kuverenga mitero otomatiki kunyika dzinodarika zana
feature.reporting.description: Ruzivo rwenguva chaiyo nemazano anobva kuAI
feature.payments.description: Gamuchira mubhadharo kuburikidza nenzira dzemuno munyika yega yega
feature.global.description: Bata magwaro ekutengeserana kwepasi rose nekutevedzera
feature.jobs.description: Kutevera purojekiti kubva kutanga kusvika kumagumo nemitengo yenguva chaiyo, app yemufoni, uye kuongorora purofiti

highlights.heading: Nei mabhizinesi achisarudza Dott
highlights.subheading: Advanced features inoita kuti tive vakasiyana nevamwe uye inobatsira bhizinesi rako kukura.

mobile.title: Mobile Application
mobile.description: Wana data yebhizinesi rako chero nguva uye chero kupi neapp yedu ine simba. Manage inventory, process sales, uye uone real-time reports paunofamba.

pos.title: POS ne Barcode Scanning
pos.description: Shandura chero device kuve powerful point-of-sale system. Scan barcode pakarepo, process sales nekukurumidza, track inventory mu real-time, uye gamuchira ese mazhinji ekubhadhara kusanganisira mari, makadhi, ne mobile money.
pos.imageAlt: POS system ine barcode scanning feature

ai.title: AI-Powered Insights
ai.description: Wana smart recommendations ne predictive analytics zvichibva ku data yebhizinesi rako. AI yedu inokubatsira kufunga demand, optimize inventory, uye identify mikana yekukura.

jobs.title: Comprehensive Job Management
jobs.description: End-to-end job costing kubva ku quote kusvika pakupera. Track zvinhu, basa, ne maexpenses ine real-time profitability analysis. Yakanakira service businesses, contractors, ne field operations ine mobile-first design.

geofencing.title: Geofencing ne Location Tracking
geofencing.description: Vimbisa accurate time tracking ne GPS-based clock in/out. Yakanakira field teams, delivery drivers, ne remote workers. Set virtual boundaries ye work sites uye wana alerts kana vashandi vapinda kana vabuda munzvimbo dzakatsaurwa.

mobilemoney.title: Mobile Money Payments
mobilemoney.description: Gamuchira mabhadharo kubva chero kupi munyika. M-Pesa integration iri live muKenya, uye MTN Mobile Money, Airtel Money, Orange Money, GCash, Paytm, Pix, ne Mercado Pago zvirikuuya. Svika kumabhiriyoni evatengi vanofarira mobile money pane traditional banking.

whatsapp.title: WhatsApp Business
whatsapp.description: Shandura kutaurirana nevatengi ne WhatsApp Business integration. Gadzira uye manage product catalog yako, otomatiki tuma ma invoices ne receipts, ipa instant customer support, uye svika kuvatengi pa messaging platform yavakafarira.

languages.title: 30+ Mitauro Inotsigirwa
languages.description: Svika kuvatengi uye manage bhizinesi rako nemutauro waunofarira. Kubva kuChirungu kusvika kuSwahili, kuSpanish kusvika kuMandarin, tinotsigira mitauro inopfuura 30 kuita kuti Dott iwane kuma businesses munyika yose.

builtForYou.title: Yakagadzirirwa Iwe
builtForYou.heading: Tongera bhizinesi rako semunyanzvi!
builtForYou.cta: Bata mazuru evaridzi vebhizinesi pasi rose vanovimba naDott kutonga bhizinesi ravo

freelancers.title: Freelancers
freelancers.description: Tevera mapurojekiti, tuma mabhiri kuvatengi nekukasika uye tonge mari yako munzvimbo imwe. Wana mari nekukasika nemabhiri ehunyanzvi.

contractors.title: Contractors
contractors.description: Tonga mapurojekiti akawanda, tevera mutengo wezvinhu nebasa uye tuma maquote ehunyanzvi. Chengetedza kuyerera kwemari kwako kwakanaka.

entrepreneurs.title: Entrepreneurs
entrepreneurs.description: Wedza startup yako nezvishandiso zvine simba zveinventory, kutengesa, nekutevera mari. Ita sarudzo dzinotsamira padata.

consultants.title: Consultants
consultants.description: Bhadharisa neawa kana purojekiti, tevera zvinoshandiswa uye tonga vatengi vakawanda zvisingaome. Kubhadhara kwehunyanzvi kwakabatanidzwa.

retail.title: Varidzi veZvitoro
retail.description: Tonga inventory nekuscan barcode, tevera kutengesa uye gamuchira nzira dzekubhadhara dzakawanda kusanganisira mobile money.

streetVendors.title: Vatengi veMumigwagwa
streetVendors.description: Dhizaini iri nyore ye mobile-first kutevera kutengesa kwezuva nezuva, kutonga inventory uye kugamuchira mubhadharo wedhijitari munzira.

marketStalls.title: Varidzi veZvitoro zveMisika
marketStalls.description: Zvakanaka pamazuva akabatikana emisika. Kuisa kutengesa nekukasika, yambiro yeinventory, nekutevera purofiti yezuva rimwe nerimwe mumari yako yemuno.

mobileMoneyAgents.title: Vamiririri veMobile Money
mobileMoneyAgents.description: Tevera kutengesa, tonga zviyero zvefloat uye gadzira mishumo yevashandi venetwork. Yakavakirwa M-Pesa, MTN, nezvimwe.

restaurants.title: Varidzi veRestaurant Diki
restaurants.description: Tonga maoda, tevera zvidyiwa, verengera mutengo wechikafu uye bata zvese zvekudyira mukati nekubvisa zvichibudirira.

serviceProviders.title: Vapan'i Vebasa
serviceProviders.description: Kuvanachiremba vemvura, magetsi, mota, nezvimwe. Rongovedza mabasa, tevera zvikamu uye bhadhara pakupera.

onlineSellers.title: Vatengi veOnline
onlineSellers.description: Batanidza inventory kuburikidza nemapuratifomu, tonga maoda uye tevera kutumira. Zvakanaka kuvatengi vesocial media.

transport.title: Vashandisi veTransport
transport.description: Kuvashandi vetaxi, boda boda, netuk-tuk. Tevera mari yezuva nezuva, mutengo wepeturu, nemagadzirirwo ekugadzirisa.

integrations.title: Kubatanidza
integrations.heading: Batanidza nezvishandiso zvaunoda
integrations.subheading: Batanidza zvisina dambudziko nezvishandiso zvebhizinesi zvinofarirwa nemaplatifomu ekubhadhara

mpesa.name: M-Pesa
mpesa.description: Gamuchira mubhadharo wemobile money zvisina dambudziko

cookieBanner.title: Chiziviso cheCookie
cookieBanner.message: Tinoshandisa makuki kuvandudza ruzivo rwako, kuongorora kushandiswa, uye kupa basa rakakosha. Nekuenderera mberi nekushandisa saiti yedu, unobvuma kushandiswa kwedu kwemakuki.

essential.title: Makuki Anodiwa
essential.description: Anodiwa kuti saiti ishande uye kuchengetedzeka

analytics.title: Makuki eAnalytics
analytics.description: Anotibatsira kunzwisisa mashandisiro aunomaitira saiti yedu

contact.heading: Bata
contact.subheading: Une mibvunzo nezve Dott? Timu yedu iri pano kukubatsira kuwana mhinduro yakakodzera yebhizinesi rako.
contact.infoSubtitle: Zadza fomu kana kubata nesu zvakananga uchishandisa ruzivo rwuri pasi.
contact.success: Maita zvekubata! Tichabata newe munguva pfupi.
contact.error: Takundikana kutumira meseji yako. Ndapota edza zvakare kana kutumira email zvakananga ku support@dottapps.com.
contact.error.name: Zita rinodiwa

hero.title: Bhizinesi Rako,
hero.subtitle: Muhomwe Yako
hero.description: Puratifomu yekutungamira bhizinesi ine AI inoshanda pasina internet.

pos.title: Nzvimbo Yekutengesa
pos.description: Ita kutengesa pakarepo, kunyange pasina internet

invoicing.title: Kukurumidza Invoice
invoicing.description: Gadzira uye tumira ma invoice uri munzira

payments.title: Mari Yenhare
payments.description: M-Pesa, mamiriro asina internet, rutsigiro rwenzvimbo

cta.title: Wakagadzirira Kukura Bhizinesi Rako?
cta.subtitle: Tanga kutungamira bhizinesi rako zvirinani nhasi
cta.terms: Hapana kadhi rekukwereta rinodiwa • Kanzura chero nguva
